member.name: T:RiotClub.FireMoth.Console.CommandLineOptions
member.summary: Defines options available when invoking the application via command line.

member.name: P:RiotClub.FireMoth.Console.CommandLineOptions.ScanDirectory
member.summary: Gets or sets the ScanDirectory option, indicating the input directory to scan.

member.name: P:RiotClub.FireMoth.Console.CommandLineOptions.RecursiveScan
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether subdirectories of will be recursively scanned in addition to its file contents.

member.name: P:RiotClub.FireMoth.Console.CommandLineOptions.OutputFile
member.summary: Gets or sets the OutputFile option, indicating the full path of the file to which any program output will be written.

member.name: P:RiotClub.FireMoth.Console.CommandLineOptions.DuplicatesOnly
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the output should include only files that have duplicate hash values.

member.name: T:RiotClub.FireMoth.Console.ExitState
member.summary: Specifies the cause of program termination.

member.name: F:RiotClub.FireMoth.Console.ExitState.StartupError
member.summary: Inidicates an error occurred during program initialization.

member.name: F:RiotClub.FireMoth.Console.ExitState.RuntimeError
member.summary: Indicates an error occurred after program initialization.

member.name: M:RiotClub.FireMoth.Console.ServiceCollectionExtensions.AddFireMothServices(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection,Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration)
member.summary: Adds services required to perform directory scanning via the FireMoth API.
member.param: The to which services are added.

member.name: M:RiotClub.FireMoth.Console.Program.Main(System.String[])
member.summary: Class and application entry point. Validates command-line arguments, performs startup configuration, and invokes the directory scanning process.
member.returns: An int return code indicating invocation result.
